content: Is there a place to start connectathon track proposals for the Sept connectathon yet? I can't find it...
Bumping this, I never saw an annoucement but @Gino Canessa pointed out to me that the track proposal deadline is tomorrow? Yikes: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/2020-09+Connectathon+25
Did this get announced somewhere that I may not be following and need to? :)
@Jenni Syed @Sandra Vance will be able to let you know when she sent out the information, but I do know that HL7 also sent out the information as well, with the last being 7/17.

I've seen the "sign up for WGM" or "sign up for Connectathon" but didn't get the email @Sandra Vance sent to track leads with the cutoff dates and track submission info. It looks like other coworkers are in the same boat. It may be good to always announce out here along with an email since some tracks will be lead by those that aren't previous track leads.
